Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: She received a second cycle of nelarabine without additional IT prophylaxis one month later .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| IT prophylaxis |

Note: I am assuming that "IT prophylaxis" refers to prophylaxis for infections of the central nervous system (CNS), which is a type of disease prevention. If "IT" is not an abbreviation for "information technology" in this context, then "IT prophylaxis" would be a valid disease entity. If "IT" is indeed an abbreviation for "information technology" in this context, then there are no disease entities in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| nelarabine |

Note: In this paragraph, "nelarabine" is the only entity that clearly refers to a disease. It is a chemotherapy drug used to treat T-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia and T-cell lymphoblastic lymphoma, which are both types of cancer (a disease). The other entity, "IT prophylaxis," is not a disease, but rather a preventative measure for infections of the central nervous system (CNS).
